resources.string: Keep your Bluetooth and Wi-Fi turned on at all times to ensure correct results. Your device must also be connected to a Wi-Fi router/device before initiating the automated diagnostics.
Are you sure you want to exit Office Works?
This should take less than 10 seconds
Are you sure you want to Sign out?
Something went wrong. Please check your Internet or try again later.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Please enter correct Email ID or Password
Please wait while we are processing your request.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Thank you for downloading Office Works Diagnostics App.

Thank you for downloading Office Works Diagnostics App.In order to assess device's health, app will perform a series of automated and interactive tests. Follow on-screen instructions to complete all tests and get accurate device valuation.

 Keep your Bluetooth and Wi-Fi turned on at all times to ensure correct results. 

The app may prompt you to grant certain permissions on the next screen to perform all tests successfully. 

Press proceed to begin.
Your order has been placed. Please consult your store manager for further processing.
To re-perform the failed tests, press \'Retest\' or press \'Next\' to begin the interactive tests. Please follow on screen instructions carefully to ensure accurate results.
To re-perform all the failed tests, press \'Retest\' or tap a test icon above to redo that one. Tap \'Next\' to proceed to device valuation.
I have read and accept all the Terms & Conditions .
Are you sure you want to exit Office Works?
Are you sure you want to quit? You will loose all the diagnostics results and the pricing associated with this quote.
Would you like to rescan the device?
Your diagnostic data has been synced successfully.

You will now be asked to click picture using front and rear camera, one at a time. Press the shutter (round button) on the screen and confirm if the pictures were taken correctly by pressing Confirm button at the bottom right corner
You have started Mega Smart Run for Diagnostics.
Please wait while we are performing diagnostics.
Great your automation diagnostics has been done.
Please press the play button to perform this test.This will play music via the device\'s speakers.
Please confirm if you are able to hear played track properly ?
Are you able to hear voice which you have recorded ?
Are you still performing the test?
Oops! The front camera doesn’t work.
Oops! The rear camera doesn’t work.
Please capture image from both front & rear camera and confirm if they are fine.
Insert earphones/headphones into the headphone jack.

As you tap \'Start\' to begin the test, the screen will turn red for a few seconds followed by green, blue, white and black to help you spot any missing or dead pixels. Please observe the screen carefully for any issues.
Is your screen free from any missing or dead pixels?
Is your screen free from any missing or dead pixels?
Are you still performing the test?
Are you able to see 5 Stars on screen?
Are you able to see 5 Stars on screen?
Press Volume up and Volume down button.
Press the power/sleep button and then unlock your phone to come back to this screen.
Port tested successfully you can now remove the charger.
Plug-in device\’s charger and ensure it\'s turned on.
%1$s fingers has been touched. Please confirm.
Touch the screen with at least 2 fingers.
Please touch the screen with at least 2 fingers.
Move your hand over the top of the screen.
Run your fingertip over all the grey blocks on the screen until they turn white.
Congrats you screen touch is working fine.Now you can press back button and continue with the other examination.
Tilt the screen around to hit the yellow,red,green balls with the blue ball. You must hit all the 3 blue balls to pass the test.
Press the home button and then wait for the app to re-open on this screen again.
Hey, I am going inside your device to test device sleep and wake button.Please press your power button.
Please place your device near the light source.
Hey, I am going inside your device to test device vibrator. You can put it on surface to avoid erroneous judgement.
Sorry no front cam is available
Please tab on the screen to paint it in white color.
Please aim your face to the front camera
Flip your phone around to aim your face to the rear/back camera
Do you want to go for manual diagnostics. If yes press continue or you can cancel it.
Please scan this barcode into the MegaMMR enabled system to automatically retrieve the diagnostics data.
Mega Smart run will automatically start the diagnostic process.
Please wait while music is playing.
Congrats your speakers are working fine.
Oops! your speakers has some issue.
Congrats your mic is working fine.
Oops! your mic has some issue.
Recorded done.Please click the play button to listen...
Please tap on the mic icon and record your voice for performing this test.
Is the location shown on map accurate?
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
This permission is required to diagnose your device, if you press cancel test will not be performed..
This permission is required to diagnose your device, if you press cancel test will not be performed..
Office Works was not allowed to access the GPS.Please open the settings of your device to grant permission.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Please click on the below icon to broadcast the data
Note:- Diagnostics data/bar code will be expired after 12 hours
Process will remove user installed applications, settings, wallpaper and sound settings. Deleted data will not be recoverable. Are you sure you want to wipe device?

Do you want to test the camera? You will be asked to take pictures using rear and front camera(if available).Press the round shutter button on the screen. Then you will be asked to verify the pictures has been taken correctly to confirm the camera is working.
Please enter the secret code sent to your email.

Do you want to test the camera? You will be asked to take pictures using rear camera by clicking the round shutter button on the screen. Then you will be asked to verify the pictures have been taken correctly to confirm the camera is working.
App will now show your location on the map. Please confirm if its accurate.
Click \"All\" to perform all the manual tests in a sequence. Click \"Manual\" to do each test individually.
This will reset all your performed diagnostics. You can perform the diagnostics later again. Do you want to proceed?
You are now in expert mode and can perform the below listed tests randomly without following any sequence.

Since 2010, Veridic Technologies has been working as a full-service IT consultancy & solutions partner, dedicated to maximizing the growth of used mobile businesses across the globe. Our clients include Enterprises, SMEs & Startups from Retailers, Wholesalers, Distributors, Telecom Operators, Office Works Providers, Warehouse Providers & Mobile Phone Recyclers.

Originally, built as an outsourcing firm for Brightstar Corporation (a USD 10 Billion company) by Mr. Ankur Thakur, now Veridic has risen to become an internationally known brand. We have a dedicated team of experts, mid & junior level 150+ employees operating from 2 offices, India & UK.

Some of the esteemed users of our products & solutions are Brightstar, Belmont, Apple, Vodafone, EE, Claro, Telcel, Telecom Italia, T Mobile, as entities using our solutions.

Note: Veridic Technologies reserves all rights for CellDe Office Works application. Any unauthorized copying, printing, reproduction, dissemination, distribution in any form is strictly prohibited.

Our clients include Enterprises, SMEs & Startups from Retailers, Wholesalers, Distributors, Telecom Operators, Office Works Providers, Warehouse Providers & Mobile Phone Recyclers.

Some of the esteemed users of our products & solutions are Brightstar, Belmont, Apple, Vodafone, EE, Claro, Telcel, Telecom Italia, T Mobile, as entities using our solutions.

Note: Veridic Technologies reserves all rights for CellDe Office Works-Pro application. Any unauthorized copying, printing, reproduction, dissemination, distribution in any form is strictly prohibited.
For further detail, Contact us at:
For production details, Contact us at:
Your device is not listed under the \n tradable device list

Office Works needs to fetch your device information including IMEI and serial number then transmit them to partner’s website for the purpose of evaluation of your device. By clicking the ACCEPT button you will agree to allow Office Works to fetch the required information from the device.

Office Works needs to fetch your device information including IMEI and serial number and transmit them to partner’s website for the purpose of evaluation of your device. By clicking the accept button you agree to allow mCheck_beta to fetch the required information from the device.
Please Check Your Internet Connection And Re-Open App
If you could hear the recorded voice properly, please press ok button to pass the test. Else, press not ok button.
If you could hear the music played properly, please press ok button to pass the test. Else, press not ok button
Please press Stop button if you have finished recording
MegaMMR needs to authenticate you before permitting you in the app. Please try again with a valid password.

Check the device casing including camera for any damage. Is the device free from any major scratches, dents or cracks? Click yes if device has only light wear and tear but no cracks and other major damages, else click no.
Rotate your phone on its horizontal axis to complete a 360° circle.
No fingerprint configured. Please register at least on finger in your device\'s settings.
Please tap on the play icon to hear your recorded voice.
Move phone vertically up down for more than once.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Place your finger on the fingerprint sensor.
Tap start to begin the test. The light will flash 3 times. Tap yes if it does, else tap no
Rotate your phone on its horizontal axis to complete a 360° circle.
There is no fingerprint configured on this phone. Please add a fingerprint in your device\’s settings to perform this test.
The fingerprint doesn\'t match for multiple times please wait for some time and try again.
App wants to turn Bluetooth ON for this device.
Too many failed attempts test failed.
All interactive tests will now run one after the other. To select and run tests, turn off the toggle.
In order to inspect your device fully, Office Works needs access to:
Touch the screen with at least 2 fingers.
Are you sure you want to exit Office Works?
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.

NOTE: The app will now prompt you to allow it to be set as the default messaging app. This is a temporary change and is required for certain features of this app to work. Please note that the default messaging app will be reverted back to the original immediately after the requirement of this app is over.

Our clients include Enterprises, SMEs & Startups from Retailers, Wholesalers, Distributors, Telecom Operators, Office Works Providers, Warehouse Providers & Mobile Phone Recyclers.

Originally, built as an outsourcing firm for Brightstar Corporation (a USD 10 Billion company) by Mr. Ankur Thakur, now Veridic has risen to become an internationally known brand. We have a dedicated team of experts, mid & junior level 150+ employees operating from 2 offices, India & UK.

We have reached the maximum number of devices that can be scanned. Please try after sometime or on some other counter.
Are you sure you want to sync the diagnostic test Data?
This app does not have access to your device\'s camera. You can enable access in app permissions.
This app does not have access to your device\'s storage. You can enable access in app permissions.
Sync failed. Please try again later
Please enter a valid first name.
Please enter a valid last name.
Please enter a valid secret code
Please enter a valid state code.
Please enter a valid postal code.
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid phone number.
Please enter a valid contact number
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid confirm email address
I hereby declare I have accessed my device’s condition accurately and that I understand the offered price is subject to quality verification at Office Works\'s warehouse.
Please add image of your identity
Your device is not tradable in our system.
However, we have shared the details of your device with support team and they will contact you.
Meanwhile, you have any queries then please forward them to
I want to share my Email-ID with Support team for further communication.
This app needs message permission to make app as default message app.
There was an error processing your request. Please check your internet connection and try again.
There is something went wrong with server please try again.
There is something went wrong with your Internet Connection Please reset your Internet Connection and try again.
Image size should not be greater than 5MB.
Secret code has been sent successfully!

An Office Works account has been auto-created for you.We have emailed you the login details and an order confirmation to your registered email address.Refer to shipping instructions provided in the email to ship your device to our warehouse for final valuation.\n\nThanks again for participating in our trade-in program.
Please enter a valid payment amount.
Please enter a valid reference code.
Please enter a valid beneficiary account number.
Please enter a valid beneficiary bank name.
Please enter a valid payment reference number.
Please enter a valid beneficiary sort code.
Please enter a valid customer account number.
Permissions are necessary for the correct work of the application and the performance of all functions
The secret code you entered is incorrect. Please check your email for the latest code received.
This app does not have access to your device\'s microphone. You can enable access in app permissions.
Tap \'Next\' to proceed to device valuation.
Oops! The volume down button doesn’t work.
Oops! The volume up button doesn’t work.
